about_the_game:
1. tos_SFA_Polka_of_Wilderness(Luchador_Theme)

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : Polka of Wilderness(Luchador Theme)
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Kazing(Composer)
ㆍArranged by Kazing
ㆍKeys & Programming : Kazing
ㆍMixing by S.F.A
ㆍMastering by Sevin(S.F.A)
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

2. tos_SFA_TigerHunter_Cherish_feat.Marcia_Wilder_remaster

[Credit]
ㆍTitle : TigerHunter Cherish feat.Marcia Wilder(remaster)
ㆍMusic Produced by S.F.A
: Sevin (Composer)
ㆍArranged by Kazing
ㆍLyrics by SungHa Hong
ㆍVocal : Marcia Wilder
ㆍMixed : Park Moon soo @LoudBell Studio
ㆍMasterd : Lee Jun Yong @Mixology Studio
ㆍMusic Published by IMCGAMES Co., Ltd.

In the ashes of the moon
A twilight gleams through
To places unknown

Whispers of hope
Coming back home
Lost in shadows alone

Legends linger in the shrine
I still see your aura shine

Tears in the sky, shining so bright,
Oh, pieces of your memories still crying last night
Stars in the sea, same galaxy
Ten thousand spirits faded into fallacy

Though you're gone, oh I’ll stay
And send you my prayer
Your wisdom and faith still shines like jade

Though I grief in silence
I still feel your guidance
Bestow all the honor you gave

Though you're gone, oh I’ll stay
And push through the pain
Your wisdom and faith, I’ll shine like a jade

Though I grief in silence
Your world won't be violent
I'll carry your honor and grace

Fallen petals start to dance with water romance
Flock of swallows flying low
Now float with the river come home, oh

Though you're gone, oh I’ll stay
And send you my prayer
Your wisdom and faith still shines like jade

Though I grief in silence
I still feel your guidance
Till fate brings us back into place

name: Tree of Savior - Hunter's Moon 2021 OST Collection

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Tree of Savior - Hunter's Moon 2021 OST Collection

short_description: Tree of Savior - Hunter's Moon 2021 OST Collection provides 16 different tracks, including an exclusive soundtrack only available on DLC.
